issue.title: [Python] Speed up deserialization code path
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1670](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1670). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment we are using smart pointers for keeping track of UnionArray types and values. We can get rid of this overhead.
